title: Ticket #384: Feed Quill++ database machine ads via collector plugin (per Igor)
description: Igor would like machine info in the Quill++ database for his glidein pool. However, he's got zillions of glideins, and doesn't want each of them hitting his RDBMS. The collector has all the info he needs, he'd prefer to have a collector plugin that feeds quill.
creator: gthain
